content.detailedDescription:
Just returned from walking to store,(walgreens).. was walking north and caught a white line in the sky... took iphone4 out of pocket .. aimed at object took picture.!!
felt like it wanted me to see it... beautiful blue sky... no fear no alarm.. it felt like i asked to see it..It just vanished in place... no movement what so ever!!!
first pic is after the date of pic!!! made wallpaper that date!!! ; )
content.summary: Walking to my apt from store visit.

content.detailedDescription: Was driveing to pick someone up,noticed three lights in the sky.Each of them had a double star look to them .Were much brighter then the stars and had aflicker to them.After picking up my girlfriend i asked her what she thought all she could say was what is that. we drove to the edge of town and parked and watched for a few min. then one light started moving are way slightly to the south of us 100 to 150ft above us.I turned off my motor to see if i could here it , all there was was a faint wer or hum .The lighting had almst gone to alight glow. it kept going westerly almost derectly over main st .We followed to the other side of town entell we lost it
content.summary: Three objects in the sky between sultan and monroe

content.detailedDescription:
I woke and went to the bathroom, the window looks out the south portion of our home. 
i glanced out the window and saw five lights, the lights were uniform, which made it appear to me, like a triangle. at first, i thought it was a strange star formation, but there were no other stars because the sky was so overcast. the lights were a little blurry, because i did not have my glasses on. i squinted my eyes to bring them into focus, next thinking it was a plane, but immediately dismissed a plane because they were moving too slowly. i watched the lights for a few seconds, but then they simply disappeared, i could not find them again. i went to tell my husband, who was watching television, but he dismissed me. so, i have been looking online to see if there was any other notations about the lights.
content.summary: Five lights that looked like they formed a triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
1-standing on street looking at stars - they moved.
2-movement and formation
3-stars - but then they moved
4-i counted 10 lights moving at what i assume was a very high altitude and quite fast. there was no noise, i could not see contrails either. i guessed it may have been a flock of satellites but thought it improbable there would be 10 of them. three travelled in a straight line with each following unit stepped to the side (maybe wake turbulence?) then a pack of 4 in a diamond shape  followed by 3 in a triangle shape. i would not discount military jets but it seemed too fast.
5-curiosity and disbelief for the first few seconds, then i tried to get my phone cam going but it was near dead, which annoyed me.
6-the lights travelled overhead and then all disappeared over the nw horizon. the lead lights seem to narrow their separation and change heading and position - curved flight path convexed to south
content.summary: A cluster of lights passed overhead in a formation that changed - horizon to horizon in aprox 20s

content.detailedDescription: On a ferry boat took pictures zoomed in to much magnification to be a planet or star zoomed picture showed a reflective orb just hanging in the air
content.summary: No planet or star in that location based on smart phone app

content.detailedDescription: In the google earth 2012 edition you can see numerous anomolies along forest road 300 between us260 - forest road 512 in arizona.  in the goolge earth 2013 edition you can clearly see numerous anomolies along the same forest road 300 between us 260 and forest road 512.  the ship is located at the gps coordinates of 34 degrees 17' 36" north / 110 degrees 52' 27" west as well as 34 degrees 51' 13" north / 110 degrees 51' 13" west.
content.summary: White with face like appearance on outer top side

content.detailedDescription: i went outside about 4:30 pm  on thanksgiving afternoon, just as the sun was setting and looked to the south. it was a cool, clear, crisp fall evening. i stayed out until 4:45 pm. i was looking for anything strange in the sky. the moon, stars or planets were not out yet, and i didn't see any exceptionally strange, but i did see a lot of small bright orbs zipping and whizzing around. at first i thought it to be a meteor shower. they seemed to be appearing and then disappearing as if to go in and out of phase. was this a type of cloak? i went back inside to get my my wife and a pair of binoculars around 5:00 pm. after returning to my front porch there was a very bright star like object in the southern sky. nothing had been there before i went inside. it seemed that it just appeared out of nowhere. i viewed the object through the binoculars and it looked like those smaller objects had attached themselves into a cluster on the outside of this larger object.  i think the larger object was in stealth mode or possibly out of phase until it suddenly appeared. the large object was shining bright and slowly rotating. it looked to be sending a white beam of light out to the sides and also down to the ground. the large object was definitely a huge triangle, it looked to be jet black with hundreds of what appeared to be orbs attached around the edges. they almost looked like windows. weird stuff for sure. the small orbs would detach , zip around, and then reattach to the main ship. after i went inside both my wife and i felt real light-headed and nausea stricken. my wife even threw up. strange indeed. i am going to have to get mufon up here to record this while i can still see it. i just want to know what it is and why it's here.
content.summary: Huge bright star like triangle with attached orbs

content.detailedDescription:
During the fall of 1979, i was eleven years old at the time. it was about 3 or 4 pm when i went out to the front driveway. i saw my neighbor jack, a very old african american man, standing a few feet into the street between both our houses. jack's house was adjacent to my mom and dads house. anyway, i walked out to see what he was doing. i always visited with jack because he had this insect collection in a fish aquarium in his garage and i always found it interesting to look at them.  jack always hung out in his garage. he would sit on a folding beach chair and just smoke or listen to his radio i guess. anyhow, this time i saw jack doing something a little different. he was just standing in the street gazing up at the sky. i walked over and asked him what he was doing. he said to take a look up or maybe he motioned with his hand and pointed. that part i don't remember, but the part i do remember is when i looked up at the sky and immediately saw two silvery discs visible between some white clouds. they were completely still,motionless. jack must have seen them originally from his garage and probably saw them there for some time but i only saw them for a few seconds. they looked slightly smaller than the size of a dime actually, each of them. 
it was mesmerizing to see them. for the few seconds i saw them, they surely burned themselves into my memory forever. especially when they rotated at about a 40 to 45 degree angle and shot up between the clouds at an unbelievable speed. they blurred or flashed out of view up through the clouds and it was all over as fast as it started for me. i was so excited to have seen such a thing that i ran into the house and excitedly told my mom and dad that i just saw two discs in the sky and i told them what they did and that jack saw them too, but they really didn't care or believe me i think. i'm now 45 years old and i can still see those discs up there clear as a bell. silver, no detail, no apparent engines, no noise, no surface detail visible whatsoever. they were simply and purely two silvery discs that demonstrated amazing gravity defying and speed capability and it was impressive as hell. i will never say it's technology from some place other than earth,i can't possibly know that. thinking about it today, i feel it's very possible that some group here on earth figured out how to do this and so that's where i stand. i know flying discs are real, they do exist because i saw them with my own eyes and so did someone else standing right next to me. those were machines constructed by someone out there.
content.summary: 2 stationary silver discs, motionless for seconds suddenly rotated at 45 degree angle, shot up instantly.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette before bed, when i saw 5 or 6 very bright orange objects flying across the eastern sky, just below jupiter and the gemini constellation. they seemed almost fuzzy to look at, but very bright.  2 of the lights remained the same brightness, but the others would brighten then slowly dim out.  they were following each other, for the most part, but the smaller ones seemed to stay close together, and they were the ones that dimmed out.  i looked around in the sky and saw 3 jets behind these lights, at some distance, but headed in the same direction, towards the north.  there were 2 more jets flying at high altitudes in opposite directions.  the objects didnt appear to make any sound.  after a few minutes had passed another bright orange light flew in the same direction and slowly faded away as the others, and i saw 2 more jets right after that - both headed north east.
content.summary: 5 or 6 orange lights dart across sky followed by 3 jets and several more inthe area at the time

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i had just left my home thankgiving night and were driving to the store.  when we made a left onto lloyd in downingtown i happened to look up and saw two fire balls flying a straight path   across the sky; 1 big and 1 small.  i quickley called my husband and told him to go out on the deck to look at them.  he knows every airplane known to man and probably built a model for almost all as well and he too, was baffled.  they were so quick too.  i turned the car around for a second look and they were gone.  my husband said that while outside watching, he heard no sound from either object.  i went to bed that night and couldnt breathe.  i think i might have been feeling  anxious over what i had witnessed.  i dont usually seek out websites to express things, but i feel obligated to report this.
content.summary: Two fire balls moving in a straight line high in the sky.  they were quick moving no noise

content.detailedDescription: Bright reddish orange object traveling swiftly north-northeast in unison with two smaller white "lighted" object (no flickering or blinking) at 45 degree angle from each other (all three equally spaced) with absolutely no sounds at all.
content.summary: Three lighted" object travel at same speeds, two smal white and one larger orange

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from the store after getting my wife some cough drops when i saw 4 orange lights through the trees in a straightline high in the sky.  i got onto a main road where the sky was more open and followed the lights.  3 separated themselves from the one on the most left.  they hovered and moved very quickly to the right and then disappeared.  it was like they vanished in thin air.  the sole remaining one hovered directly above as i drove down the road.  it flew slightly to the right and then, all of a sudden, it was gone.  i drove around for another ten minutes trying to find them again, but to no avail.  the total duration of the sighting was around 3 - 4 minutes.  of course, the only time i witness ufo's, nobody is with me to see them also.  but, i know what i saw and they were not planes, helicopters, orbs, or meteors.  they were orange objects with red lights amidst the exterior which flew and vanished.
content.summary: 4 orange shapes hovering.  3 flew then disappeared.  1 hovered and flew approximately 100 feet then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: The first sighting occurred thanksgiving night i was looking out my window it was a black sky no stars then there was this very bright light that seemed to sit still for a few minutes so i didn't think much other then it was a really bright star but then it appeared to move up then spiral back and i couldn't believe what i saw no plane i know can move like it did and then a minute later it spiraled again and then it just vanished and i stared out the window and ran to other windows and couldn't find it again. the next night november 29th i saw the same light hovering above the tree line and it was around just before 7 pm it hovered and i watched it for about 5 minutes then i ran to get my camera to try to capture an image of it, i zoomed in out the back door and took a couple pictures that caught the object. i took a few minutes to review the images and was astonished and excited and by the time the object was there but it was lower in the sky, in the trees and it was harder to see, then it was just gone. it was me and my dad saw it as well. every few minutes i check to see if its there again and its just gone, it did not move like a plane it was a bright yellow ball of light. the images below are what i saw and i intend to keep my eyes peeled on the skies.
content.summary: Bright yellow light appeared stationary at first then moved position

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from grocery shopping at giant on maple ave when i first saw it. it was a single medium brightness white light that was pulsating. when the white light was 'turned off' it was a small bluish light, pale blue, then, the light would ' grow' into a brighter larger white light, then the white light would shrink back to the small bluish white light and grow again to bright white light... i noticed it to the east and it was moving southeast to northeast. at first, i thought is was a plane or helicopter. something was different about it, so it caught my attention and i kept looking at it. i also followed it. at this point, i no longer thought it was a plane or helicopter but a ufo. so, instead of going home, i followed it for a few minutes until i couldn't follow it anymore. i went to school road park and it flew over the trees and i lost it. i decided to go back home, so i kept driving straight on school road park to turn onto orville road and head back home. to my amazement, there was the object again, now visible over a clearing... however, it was not going in that direction before i lost it. it would have had to have 'jumped' to get to that new position in the sky from where i last saw it to be where i saw it now. weird. anyhow, it flew over route 309 and i couldn't follow it any longer. i wanted to get it on video with my phone, but as i was fumbling with my phone, i didn't want to take my eyes off of the object, i didn't want to miss anything. it happened rather quickly and i didn't have chance to catch it on video with my phone. for now on, i will have my phone ready for these things.
content.summary: Single pulsating white light, when it was 'off', pale blie light.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at home which sits on the top of a high hill just sw of nashville about 20 miles. we noticed a curiously bright planet like star near sirius location or venus. it was there about an hour and a half. put the video camera on it to see it closer up. it was like a squared off diamond shape.  the top was a pretty blue.  there were moving patterns on it. sometimes white bands from bottom of the diamond slowly moved up in bands.  then there was an x.  there were changes in colors. subtle changes.  from the naked eye it was beautifully sparkling six pointed star bigger than other planets. red and yellow flashes.  at one point we watched it rotate.  it is predominately grey. when it rotated, it looked like a thin card. four of us were watching this. not sure if it is sirius or venus but how do you explain the things we were seeing?  then we left the camera on it and went inside to get warm. when i went out a few minutes later, that particular star or ufo was gone. the other stars were still there.
 im feeling a sense of awe. excited. curious and open and searching for answers.  just enjoyed the entire event.  sorry we didnt see it disappear.  maybe we captured it on video.  after dinner we will put the video online to see if we can determine how it disappeared.

let me know how to add a video to this...I cant do it at the moment.
content.summary: Bright star like flashing. grey diamond shaped under zoom lens. showed bands and patterns. watched it turn.

content.detailedDescription: In florida, i attempted communication as part of my studies, and had three close encounters of the third and fourth kind. police stopped me, somehow they knew what i was doing immediately. i've been in michigan for a few months and was outside on the back patio with my skeptic mother. i told her i have communicated before and she wanted to see it. i had a digital voice recorder with me and as we stared up at the sky, we asked them to talk with us. we then observed 4 yellow star like object very rapidly come into the middle of the sky and into a formation hovering high above us. it was like they were posing as stars. then we observe huge shadowy waves that sweep the sky when they are around, like an energy field. i asked if they have a message for earth and the objects started zipping around like bacteria in a glass. i felt dizzy and kind of scared. my voice recorder was on so i stopped it and played it back. on it was something that sounded like someone took part of a tv program and used it to give a message, even tho it was so late, no noise was around at all and no tvs were near by. the playback had a sound of church bells before a speech which was as this: "children, he's not ready so do what you have to do..I believe." this sounded like an african american preacher, and you could hear faint voices of a congregation in the background of hysteria. then as fast as it was there, there was nothing. the lights in the sky had then joined and became one object and moved towards a tree and hovered, then just disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have had close encounters in the past, mainly after attempting communication. this time it worked again and others saw too.

content.detailedDescription:
On thanksgiving, november 28,2013, my partner and i was leaving the rv to go inside the house when i looked into the southern sky as i do every night. this time i saw something glowing and changing color faster the a cuttlefish. i ask him if he could see it because i was not wearing my eye glasses. he said he could and i asked him to get the binoculars out of the rv. 
we could see it but i saw two flashing items. but we could see it and it was no plane. i went to the house to get our nephew. he came out and confirmed that he was seeing it two. my partner got my telescope. we set it up and the object stayed in place. 
when i looked i was amazed! i told them to look too. it was changing colors fast! it had a haze���around it. but you could see a pattern on it. it looked like a computers motherboard cut into a circle. our nephews son had came out and he looked. he started asking what it was? 
we watched for over an hour making small adjustments to the telescope. our nephew went inside when his wife came out. but his son stayed.
we noticed that we could see smaller objects on it. it was almost like watching a city in action. the object did not seem to be in any hurry, but we did not know who to contact. it would change directions, it would stop and hover. because of telephone wires, it stopped with a wire deviding it in half from our view and all three of us saw it. i did try to take video, but since i could not see it on my tablet i turned it off. i saw the video i did take and yes it is jerky it show the object changing colors fast. i did try to contact the local news by sending an email, but nothing. i was hoping to have some one else see it. we did think it might be a plane until one flew right towards it and then headed northeast. not a blimp. it was clearly round and was not connected to anything. it was bright and there was no shadows. the object its self had a haze about it. i was able to focus on a pattern and watch things follow a path.
after an hour we went inside and after anther hour it was still there. it had just moved towards the southwest. 
we all saw it but have no idea what it was. i was glad to see it and with other witnesses.
content.summary: Seen object in s/sw sky flashing bright colors able to see through telescope for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around my rig waiting on a tire repairman to finish changing my tire, when i noticed an oval shaped object inside a fog like cloud. i joked to myself that it was a ufo over downtown knoxville, and thought wouldn't that be something? i pulled out my cell phone and took a picture, then zoomed in and took a second picture. sorry no landmarks at bottom, my finger covered part of the lens. there were two planes moving around the object one turning above the object, i could see a flash of his wings as he turned, the second was flying next to the object, leaving a trail behind it.I could not i'd the planes, too small, but concidering it was flying at a 45 degree angle, over a city, i assume it was a military plane. note, there were storms in the background, and there was supposed to be a full moon, but i did not see it. i thought maybe it was a reflection of the moon, but it was just before sunup,still twilight outside. and the object changed from oval to round as it turned downward inside the cloud. there is a dark area at the top right of the circle which looked almost like a w, without the middle section of the letter. it also had some white lines which to me looks like the cloud is rolling upon the downward edge of the craft. i estimate that the jets moved from 10,000 feet to about 25,000 feet within 2 minutes time. and if that is correct, it would make the object between 2 and 3 miles wide. it appeared disc shaped with the top side almost glowing white, and the outer ring black, with a curved edge. i took the two photos, and the repairman yelled at me, and i went and took a few pics of my damaged tire, and went back to look at the object in the cloud again, and it seemed to have disappeared , but the cloud still gloed a little, as if the object was flat, but i could no longer see it. my question is ..Why would 2 planes be around it if there wasn't anything there? also, i watched the weather that evening which had a radar from morristown, tennessee, and thought i saw a blip on the radar during the time lapse radar report. i would like to get a copy of that report. it was there about 2 minutes, then was gone. i have two photos.
content.summary: Oval shaped light with black outer ring hanging inside a cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Preface: i've lived close to mcguire air force base (now joint base mcguire dix lakehurst) my entire life.  there are also several small rural airports for single engine planes and helicopters in the area, along with air traffic from philadelphia, trenton-mercer, atlantic city, north jersey & new york area airports.  after the time change in early november, the large number of air traffic in the sky has caught my attention on my ride home, but this encounter was different from what i'm used to seeing.

conditions: night/dark, clear skies (if there were clouds they were not noticeable or did not play a part in what i saw because i don't remember them and there were lots of stars).

my encounter:  driving home from work on november 20, 2013 at approx 18:15 hrs, i was headed south on route 206 in southampton, nj (usa) approaching the area of main street/retreat rd intersection, when i noticed an object flying about the same speed as a small single engine aircraft off to about my 1 o'clock view (south/southwest part of sky).  there are several small rural airports for small size aircraft in the vicinity so i initially thought i was seeing a small single engine airplane lining up for landing at one of them.  

the object was flying (sort of) toward me, headed north/northeast.  the object almost reached main street and made a quick 180 degree turn flying back toward red lion rd, headed south/southwest again.  as i passed main street, trees along route 206 started occasionally blocking my view, but in between breaks in the trees i was able to see it make two more quick turns flying in a criss-cross pattern over the wooded and farm areas in the vicinity of red lion & hilliards bridge rds before disappearing from my view again.  i initially assumed it was a plane positioning itself to land at the red lion airport, but the sudden quick turns i witnessed from the craft and the triangle light pattern on the underside of the craft left me puzzled.  

as i continued travelling down route 206, each time there was a clearing/opening in the trees i would see the aircraft.  i kept watching toward the airport to see if i could catch it landing when the trees opened up again.  as i approached the area of ridge rd i realized the craft was now headed in a path that would cross over route 206, from approx west/southwest toward east/northeast.  it had also slowed down quite a bit and, as i got closer, i realized it was going to cross over the highway right over top of me.  at this point i also realized the craft was much larger than a small single engine plane.  because we are in close proximity to the military base and this is the exact location where i've encountered military aircraft positioning themselves for landing i now assumed it was military aircraft.  i opened my sun/moon roof and cracked my windows so i could hear the 'plane' as it went over me.  

as we intersected each other the craft seemed a little slower and lower than what i am used to seeing on this flight path.  it had an engine noise, but was much quieter and had less of a rumble than the usual large military aircraft i've had fly over me before.  i could see a small portion of the underside of the aircraft between the three bright white lights and it appeared to be same color and/or pattern (maybe panels?) i would expect to see on the underside of a large airplane.  the silhouette against the night sky also appeared that the object itself was triangle in shape with one solid white light at each corner, explaining the triange light pattern.  after the object flew over me it took about 15 seconds (give or take a couple seconds) to reach the red lion circle where the sky is much more open.  as i went around the circle and looked back to where i would expect the object to be flying i could not locate this aircraft again.  

i consider myself to be a skeptical person, but i am opened to the possibility of unexplained experiences.  after thinking about it, several things did not make sense to me.  1) the initial flight pattern i witnessed seemed too quick and sudden for this large of an aircraft.  2) i wondered the possibility i had seen two different aircraft, but i really do not think so.  the light pattern is what caught my attention.  the three solid, bright, white lights in a triangle pattern with no other lights.  all aircraft i remember seeing usually have at least one or more blinking lights somewhere on the plane, sometimes in a different color.  this did not.  3) the craft was also flying much lower and slower than usual, since it was still several miles (maybe even 10 or more miles) to the runway at jbmdl.  4) where did it go when i looked back for it about 15 seconds after it flew over me?  4) i also thought about the possibility it was a drone since there is a lot of talk about drones these days.  it seemed a little larger than i would expect of a drone, but i don't know a lot about them.  it did have an engine sound, although quieter and less of a rumble than i would normally expect from aircraft of that size.  technology is ever changing, so who knows.  

at this point i have not been able to put a name to what i saw, so it is (to me) a ufo.  would love to know if there is a valid explanation or if anyone else saw what i saw that night.
content.summary: Observed triangle shapped object with 3 steady white lights on underside also in triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription: Saw several glowing orbs that i thought might be flares or something but they were traveling against the wind flow toward the ocean, they were way to yellow and orange to be a plane. although i did see a plane in same area moving the same direction towards lax. one by one they started to disappear. very strange.
content.summary: Glowing orbs over the 405 fwy last night

content.detailedDescription: Very bright object low to ground  moving from east to west very slowly , grabbed my binoculars 12by 50 s was just round very bright , thought it must be comet , drove about one mile to get my wife observed it on way but was gone when i got there ? not sure what it was , i know it was not an aircraft seemed to have the brightness of the iss but dont think it was near us at that time ? and moving the speed of celestial bodies in space eg. moon
content.summary: Very very bright object very lowxto south horizon moving east to west ...Thought it was the comet that was being chewed up by the sun , but it was destroyed around noon time ? the i.S.S is the only object observec this bright in sky not here till 5 a.M

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog out and was looking at the few remaining stars in the sky. one of them appeared to be moving. i looked closely for a few seconds and realized not only was it moving, it was one light, no blinking lights like planes have. i called to my friend to come out and bring the binoculars. the light made odd movements, almost as if it were jumping to the right or to the left in short spurts.  there was no sound. when i got the binoculars i saw the shape which was all light. it looked like a bell shape on the bottom with a little dome on top.  the craft did not look very big at all.  i had seen this same light before about a month ago but did not report it because i thought it might be a drone and did not get a closer look as i did with the binoculars today. the craft came in from a northwest direction and as it jumped around it moved towards a south direction and then disappeared from my view line. my friend saw the light with no blinking lights however was attending to the dog while i looked with the binoculars.  we had another incident in february that blew our minds. i think the 11w corridor may be a flight path of some sort for these visitors. amazing!
content.summary: Early morning odd moving light when viewed with binoculars looks like mini dome of light

content.detailedDescription: It's hard for me to put in words,call or email me if needed. i looked out my bedroom window looking at the stars while laying in bed and saw 20 to 30 star like ufo,s going east to west in a cluster than forming 3 v's before going out of sight because they were to far away,there was nothing in the way to hinder my view..This lasted for about 20 to 30 seconds. these were not satilites or the many military jets i see all the time.They were to fast and to high for them.The sky was clear and only the stars were out,perfect for viewing.This was also not the first time i have seen them. 6 mos.Ago i saw something amazing i can't put into words.My wife also saw five or 6 of them a few mos. ago on her way to work.I have heard of other people seeing these things in the area also.I had to tell this to sombody because i have told friends and they just give me the look u know?.I have 15/20 vision and do not drink or take drugs this was the most exciting thing i have ever seen in my life except for maybe my other sighting about 6 mos. ago. and know this was not aircraft.Sorry for the spelling.Again feel free to call or email me.
content.summary: 20 to 30 ufo's going east to west

content.detailedDescription: Posted story before, this is a pic we took of it last night, tried looking through telescope, but weather conditions weren't good....This has been in the sky for about 2 months, everynight it's clear, and we have seen it take off and turn into what looks like a plane.
content.summary: We've seen this take flight

content.detailedDescription: Leaving my girlfriend's aunt and uncle's house for thanksgiving at almost exactly 6pm this evening cst, we waved goodbye and turned to walk to the car.  overhead there was a commercial aircraft in final approach to the nearby nashville airport, probably just under 1000 feet.  as we were hearing the sound of their jets, we both looked up and saw what looked like a southwest airlines plane.  as our angle of vision fell to about 45 to 35 degrees from the zenith angle above us, my girlfriend and i both saw the glow of 3 orange/red lights in a triangular formation.  at first it looked like 3 lights on the tips of what would have been a tremendous singular entity, but after 2 or 3 seconds, i decided that they were 3 separate entities flying in a formation.  as they moved from the northwest to the northeast across the sky with moderate speed, a 4th, 5th and 6th light appeared to come into view from the same northwestern position, following the path and at the same speed, except that the 4th, 5th and 6th lights were in a row with considerable distance between them, like periods of ellipses with a lot of space between them.  the lights themselves were a constant brightness the entire time they were visible, with a large steady broadcast rather than a pulse, blink, fireball, afterburner or alternating frequency.  my first thought was that it was the astra tr-3b at a very low altitude, but then my second thought was that it was a military helicopter formation.  upon further thought though, at that distance we should have heard some sort of noise had they been helicopters.  as it moved towards the east, it passed behind some tall trees and the triangle was gone.  behind it trailed the 3 lights in a linear row, 1 of which at some point in view turned its light off and thus disappeared without seeming to change direction or leave its flight pattern.  we all watched as the last of the lights faded behind the trees.  i would not have filed this report except that my girlfriend googled something about lights in the sky in nashville, and someone else had filed what sounds like this same set of circumstances but from much further east, in hendersonville nc.
content.summary: Seemed like 3 nearby orange lights flying in formation with no sound after having seen and heard a commerical airliner fly over.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 11 at night, a bright pulsating light appeared over the horizon and increased in brightness. it then began to move frequently in many directions, changing its pattern as well as observable light characteristics during the hour it was observed.

the ufo was seen over fort saskatchewan, a small town 20 minutes north east of edmonton, alberta. this object was seen by 4 individuals, video taped by 1 and then disappeared before we could properly investigate.

these objects are appearing more and more frequently in this area, increasing from one a month, to one a week. 

other sightings have included 1-3 objects in close proximity. all were observed for around an hour at a time, before flashing brightly and disappearing. these are still ongoing.

all parties felt nervous then overwhelmingly frightened after observing the object, having feelings of being watched. one individual became suddenly overcome with vertigo and vomited. i personally felt as if something was scratching at the back of my mind, and would not go away for almost 4 hours. all who observed the object are fine currently, but become anxious if the subject is brought up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At around 11 at night, a bright, pulsating light appeared over the horizon and increased in brightness

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down 28th ave towards cactus to a gas station and noticed a blue light.  it remained around the same altitude for over 4 mins but moved left to right fairly quickly (quicker than any airplane i've ever seen) and may have moved up and down a bit too.  it was very high and very far away but it almost looked like it would get closer and further away also.
i thought i was just seeing things but then i noticed a couple cars were pulled over looking at it also.  as i walked by one of the cars, i asked if they were looking at it and it was two girls that saw it, pulled over, and were watching it and they were freaked out.  about that time, the light just disappeared and i walked in the gas station.  i came back home and looked it up and there are definitely others around me that have seen it in the past.
content.summary: Bright blue long glowing light moving in different directions quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a two (2) part sighting of four (4) objects which occurred during an approximate half hour period.

part 1.)
 1977, dark, very clear, quiet, spring evening. suburbia, 45 minutes north-west of manhattan, ny, usa. i was age 18, sober, waiting outside for my friend's mom to pick me up for a weekend trip. 
topography: standing on the east-side of the bottom of a valley running straight north-south where a commuter train and nearby highway run parallel; creating a clear view looking south-west. 
 i observed in the sky, at a distance of approximately less than 1/4 mile, a steady flashing red light moving either straight down or directly toward me. i assumed it was a helicopter but heard no noise. i did however, very clearly hear intermittent vehicular traffic which was coming from a farther distance within the valley. the flashing red lights moved downward, slow, straight, and steady until reaching an altitude of approximately 100-200 feet. then the object stopped and hovered motionless at which time the red light changed to blue and stopped flashing. after several minutes i ran inside the house to tell my parents who were watching tv; they were asleep so i didn't wake them. less than 10 minutes later the blue light began flashing and moved due south away from me at a slow steady rate, then out of site.

part 2.) 
 i started scanning the sky for more activity but the only objects observed were at a very high altitude. there were 3 white lights, which i thought were jet-liners flying in completely  different sections of the sky.  i continued walking around the front yard trying to scan as much of the sky as possible, from different angles. over the course of several minutes the only thing moving in the sky were those same three jet-liners which now appeared to be moving toward each other; but at that great distance i had no perspective as to their relative distance or altitude from one another. those 3 lights kept moving on a course, and at the same steady rate, toward the same part of the sky. i held my gaze on their potential collision course. i was astonished at how extremely close they were converging. just prior to crossing paths, all 3 lights stopped dead. they formed an equilateral triangle and did not move. they now appeared to look like any other star in the sky almost directly above me. i did not look away until my ride finally arrived several minutes later. 

now i know that apparently stationary stars may very well be ufo's hovering in our atmosphere.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 events w/in 1/2 hour; 4 objects total. the 1st  resembled silent helicopter-ish motion/altitude. then 3 high-altitude objects. dark clear night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in sw denver near evans and federal at family's house for thanksgiving dinner when i went out back to have a cig and as i smoked i gazed up at the night sky and saw a abnormally bright light to the sw of denver. at first i thought it had to be the spot light off of a helicopter because it was very bright. the brightest object in the sky for 2 hrs. but i continued to watch it for like 15 mins and it didnt appear to be moving or have any flashing lights just a solid white light. it just stood there like a huge bright star. every 15 mins after my smoke i would go outside to see if the object was still there. it appeared to have moved very slowly towards the west on a straight horizontal path. until about 2 hrs had passed and i no longer observed the object in the sky. i pointed the object out to several family members and 1 even got a still photo.
content.summary: Never saw anything like it before. very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: When i was 4 or 5 years old (1956-57) i was playing in my backyard. there seems to be a blank as to any preceding events, but i remember standing alone with my head down. i remember hearing a humming noise. i did not immediately look up, but listened for a few seconds. when i looked up, i saw a craft that i can best describe as looking like an airplane with no wings or tail. there were what appeared to be observation windows located along the side of the craft. there were occupants in the craft looking directly at me. the object was hovering between my house and our neighbor's house to the south, approximately tree top height (trees nearby were mature walnut). i stood and looked up at the craft and occupants for several seconds. the occupants were humanoid. i do not recall any unusual features except that they had what i would describe as a serious or intent look. there was no real expression on their faces. i can't say exactly how many occupants there were, but it was more than 3. initially i did not feel frightened, but after several seconds i remember feeling an intense fear come over me. i screamed and ran into my house. i actually blocked this memory for about 12 or 13 years until i saw a depiction of a similar craft in a book on ufos i picked up in my high school library. the memory came rushing back and rather frightened me. i came home and asked my mother if there was any unusual incident she could remember regarding me and a frightening experience i might have had when i was 4 or 5. she recalled that about that time i had run screaming into the house repeating over and over that "the airplane was going to get me". she said after that it was weeks before i would go outside. she said i was apparently terrified about something. the one thing that troubles me is that the event occurred in broad daylight and in a tract neighborhood (westmont, located in pomona, ca. i don't know how a craft like that could have been hovering relatively low to the ground and no one else saw it. that i just cannot explain. i will say that while this was the only time i can say i viewed a craft, there have been other unsettling experiences over the next 30 years or so after my initial recollection of this event. my first husband coincidentally reported an incident that occurred when he was about the same age i was when i had my sighting only his was an actual encounter with beings that involved missing time and amnesia of the event by other family members who were present. i don't want to go into details of this or my own later experiences unless this organization feels it is worth exploring. this memory in particular has haunted me for a long time. it would be nice to know if there is a simple explanation or if this really could have been an alien encounter. i don't talk about this much because frankly i don't want to be thought of as a kook.
content.summary: Sighting in broad daylight of hovering cylindrical object. a humming sound was noted. there were occupants who appeared through observation windows of the object.
